pages.text: kalet ya veyleta eelidu veena `acuzuv vehaza ba`li seyha. inne haza lesey'un `acib
kalu eta`cebine min emri-llahi rahmetu-llahi veberakatuhu `aleykum ehle-lbeyt. innehu hamidum mecid
felemma zehebe `an ibrahime-rrav`u vecaethu-lbusra yucadiluna fi kavmi lut
ya ibrahimu a`rid `an haza. innehu kad cae emru rabbik. veinnehum atihim `azabun gayru merdud
velemma caet rusuluna lutan sie bihim vedaka bihim zer`av vekale haza yevmun `asib
vecaehu kavmuhu yuhra`une ileyhi vemin kablu kanu ya`melune-sseyyiat. kale ya kavmi haulai benati hunne atheru lekum fetteku-llahe vela tuhzuni fi dayfi. eleyse minkum raculur rasid
kalu lekad `alimte ma lena fi benatike min hakk. veinneke leta`lemu ma nurid
kale lev enne li bikum kuvveten ev avi ila ruknin sedid

kalu ya lutu inna rusulu rabbike ley yesilu ileyke feesri biehlike bikit`im mine-lleyli vela yeltefit minkum ehadun ille-mraetek. innehu musibuha ma esabehum. inne mev`idehumu-ssubh. eleyse-ssubhu bikarib
